transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir, namaskar main IndiaMART se baat kar raha tha. Bataiye sir Ranjit ji aapko kya problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Sir ye hai sir ji ki humne abhi ek by lead search kiya.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Barabar. To unko baat kiya to bolte humko koi requirement nahi hai. Aapko kitne number de diya. To aap log jo koi bhi lead dete ho usko verify karke nahi dete ho kya?
Executive: Sir dekhiye aap IndiaMART pe na jo leads jo aati hai aapke pass for sure aapko aisa nahi hai ki sir aapke agar aapko jaise 10 leads aayi to 10 ke 10 bilkul kaam ke honge par sir ha ye nahi ho sakta ki 10 ke 10 bekar honge sir. Are lekin main aapko teen teen jagah pe maine by lead search kiya mera ek to aapne jo jinka do by lead diye hue ho.
Customer: Haan. Haan usme se. Sir abhi aapne.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Bataiye bataiye please bataiye.
Customer: Ek example deta hu. Shivani automation karke hai Revar Maharashtra ka. Temperature sensor ka.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Click kiya. Abhi usko phone kiya to bolte mere ko kuch nahi chahiye.
Executive: Kuch nahi chahiye. Sir ye itne matlab agar aapke pass 10 lead aati hai to 10 mein se kitne mein aise problem aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Main to kal se main main teen ko aur bhi bata du. Ek ye hai apna aur.
Executive: Sir jaise ki main dekh pa raha hu kal ke date mein na aapne 6 tarikh ke date mein Santosh Tiwari ji se ek maine aapne baat kiya hai. Ek aapne Sri Ram ji se baat kiya hai. Dusra aapne ek Amit Kumar Barnwal se baat kiya hai. Teesra aapne Suresh Kumar se baat kiya hai. Chautha aapne Vishnu ji se aapne baat kiya hai. To inme inme se kya kya baat hui hai main jaan sakta hu sir in sab mein?
Customer: Ye Amit Kumar bol rahe mere pass koi inquiry nahi hai. Ek.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Issue ho gaya. Ek dusra aaj ke liye jo dekhenge aap aaj bhi baat kiya maine automation se.
Executive: Vidya Vidya Amrakar hai kya?
Customer: Haan Vidya Vidya Amrakar se. Ab unko phone lekin main ye ye nahi nahi main wo ye janna chahunga ye jo pehle panch logo mein kal aapne jo baat ki hai ye panch mein se kitne kaam ke nikle aapke?
Customer: Char kaam ke nikle ek kaam ka nahi nikla.
Executive: To matlab aap ye kehna chah rahe ho sir agar aap che saat logo mein baat kar rahe ho to char teen char kaam ke nikal rahe hain right?
Customer: Haan to lekin main ye bol raha hu dekho apna unka bhi time waste hota hai apna bhi time waste hota hai. Sir sir aap IndiaMART platform. Dekho sir online ka platform hai. Nahi nahi but online ka platform hai sir. Right? Online ke platform mein sir aap har lead to sahi nahi ho sakta but for ha sir ye hai ki har lead bekar bhi nahi hoga sir aapka.
Customer: Haan to yahi main bol raha tha sir ji zara jo cheez hota hai na verify karke kaise hum log koi cheez aapko dete hain to aap log mere sath verify karte ho. Isi tarah aap bhi verify karke lead dijiye.
Executive: Verify karte hain hamari team uski team ka ek other definitely uska wo hai sir wo kaam kar rahe hain us cheez pe. Right? Team alag hai sir teen type se business milta hai sir aapko. Teen type se business. bol rahi hai na.
Executive: Nahi sir theek hai sir main nahi keh raha hu ki aapko sab ke sab lead aapke kaam ke honge main keh hi raha hu na sir aapko 17 lead hum aapko week ke dete hain sir. For sure aapka teen char lead kaam ke niklega hi niklega sir. Aap se koi bura na nahi de raha hu bas samjha raha hu jo bhi lead de na kyuki main unko phone karta hu to na bol dete to usme acha nahi lagta na apne ko.
Executive: Main main samajh gaya aapki baat sir main nahi keh raha hu ki aap galat keh rahe hain lekin sir aap as a ek aap bhi samajhne ka try kariye as a supplier online ka platform hai sir. Some time kya hota hai ki koi search kar leta hai online se abhi. Ayushi mam ha bilkul aapke jo manager hai Ayushi mam hai to agar aapko is type ka kuch issue aata hai na sir aap unke directly number pe contact kar sakte hain sir. Unka direct number nahi hai na mere pass. Aapke pass number nahi hai unka? Ek minute main aapko ek minute ek number check kariye sir aapka manager ka main bata raha hu number aapko. Ha boliye na. Are number bolo abhi.
Executive: 87.
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Ayushi Dubey hai na?
Customer: Ha Ayushi Dubey ji hai. Main number bata raha hu aapko.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Executive: 87440.
Customer: 87440.
Executive: 07365.
Customer: 07 36.
Executive: 365. Sir agar aapko kuch bhi issue aata hai na to aap unko na sir isi number pe directly agar is type ke kuch bhi lagta hai ya kuch bhi janna hai aapko IndiaMART se to directly isi number pe aap contact karenge na sir to usse kya hoga ki aapki directly unse baat ho jayegi sir. 874400 8744007365 65 hai sir last mein. Right ye aapke manager hai Ayushi Dubey ji hai aap isko number ko aap save kar lijiye IndiaMART manager ke naam se Ayushi ji hai na to that ki aapko kahi jana na pade.
Customer: Wo apna tender ke liye jo hota hai wo gem registration karwane ka hai. Aap log koi support karoge ki main private pay karu?
Executive: Sir gem portal ki jo baat hai sir wo of course wo government ke side se hota hai hai na to hum just aapko tender ka na tender ka information dete hain sir hum aapko. Kyuki hamare jo bade bade ha bade bade competitor hai na wo jo cheeze hai wo jo cheeze hai na tender ka ye log kya hai gem mein registration hai isliye hamare jo government ke kaam hai na humko wo bhi lene ka hai. To wo cheeze jo hota hai na sir jo gem ki baat kar rahe hain aap gem portal ki wo aapke CA ke side se ho sakta hai sir CA se aap confirmation le sakte hain usko kaise karna hai kaise. Okay main CA se baat karta hu. Haan us cheez ke liye na gem portal registration ke liye aap apne CA se confirmation le sakte hain kyuki account ka pura kaam wo sara cheeze wohi dekhte hain to usme hame kya karna hoga wo cheeze wohi de sakte hain. Hum aapko tender ka. Mera naam? Haan. Mera naam Amit hai sir. Amit sir. Okay chalo theek hai main Ayushi madam se waisa issue rahega baat kar lunga. Sir abhi aapne 96 pe call kiya tha to iska ek concern raise hua tha to main ye concern close kar sakta hu aapka? Kya cheez? Sir abhi aapne na 9696 pe call kiya tha IndiaMART customer care pe call kiya tha right? To aapka ek concern raise hua tha aapki company ka to main ye close kar du aapka aapne mujhe bataya to uske according. Haan haan haan close kar do. To iske regarding aapke pass ek feedback jayega sir please aap satisfied kar dijiyega sir request. Okay. Thank you thank you. Thank you sir thank you. Take care sir have a great day. Baki koi bhi issue aata hai aap Ayushi ji se contact kar sakte hain. Wo aap se baat kara denge hum se bhi baat kara denge. Okay. Okay sir take care Ranjit sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.

- Feels time is wasted on unverified leads.

- Enquiring about GEM registration support.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the online platform limitations.

- Provided manager's contact for direct assistance.

- Advised to contact CA for GEM registration support.

- Closed the concern raised from the previous call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact manager for issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, verification, gem registration, support
